languages.text: Криптопурификационные вирусы вступили в борьбу с пораженными Хаосом когитаторами. Многие техножрецы потеряли жизни, сражаясь с коварным мусорным кодом. Видеть, как взбесившийся мехадендрит отрывает голову своему хозяину — то еще зрелище. Когда ритуалы были завершены, турели прекратили огонь. Однако стоило первым отрядам наступления подойти к воротам, как не до конца очищенные орудия в последний раз ожили и унесли жизни многих солдат.

traits.locale_text: Криптопурификационные вирусы вступили в неравную борьбу с пораженными Хаосом когитаторами. Многие техножрецы потеряли жизни, сражаясь с коварным мусорным кодом. Видеть как взбесившийся механодендрит отрывает голову своему хозяину — то еще зрелище. Когда ритуалы были закончены, турели прекратили огонь. Однако стоило первым отрядам наступления подойти к воротам, как не до конца очищенные орудия врага в последний раз ожили и открыли огонь, унеся жизни многих солдат, прежде чем умолкнуть навсегда.

languages.text: A battle ensued between the cryptopurification viruses and the Chaos-stricken cogitators. Many Tech-Priests lost their lives in the fight against the devious scrap-code. It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.
languages.original_text: Криптопурификационные вирусы вступили в борьбу с пораженными Хаосом когитаторами. Многие техножрецы потеряли жизни, сражаясь с коварным мусорным кодом. Видеть, как взбесившийся мехадендрит отрывает голову своему хозяину — то еще зрелище. Когда ритуалы были завершены, турели прекратили огонь. Однако стоило первым отрядам наступления подойти к воротам, как не до конца очищенные орудия в последний раз ожили и унесли жизни многих солдат.

traits.locale_text: A battle ensued between the cryptopurification viruses and the Chaos-stricken cogitators. Many Tech-Priests lost their lives in the fight against the devious scrap-code. It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as the our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.

It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.

languages.text: 密码净化病毒与被混沌感染的沉思者展开了一场大战，许许多多技术神甫在与邪恶废码的战斗中丧生。那些发狂的机械触须把技术神甫的脑袋扯了下来，那一幕我恐怕永远都不会忘记。仪式结束之后，所有炮台停止了射击。然而，当我们的先遣部队靠近大门时，那些侥幸逃过这场净化的混沌炮台再次开火，夺走了许多勇士的生命。
languages.original_text: A battle ensued between the cryptopurification viruses and the Chaos-stricken cogitators. Many Tech-Priests lost their lives in the fight against the devious scrap-code. It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.

traits.locale_text: 密码净化病毒与被混沌感染的思考器展开了一场大战，许许多多技术祭司在与邪恶废码的战斗中丧生。那些发狂的机械触须把技术祭司的脑袋扯了下来，那一幕我恐怕永远都不会忘记。仪式结束之后，所有炮台停止了射击。然而，当我们的先遣部队靠近大门时，那些侥幸逃过这场净化的混沌炮台再次开火，夺走了许多勇士的生命。

languages.text: Un combat a ensuite éclaté entre les virus de cryptopurification et les cogitateurs sous l'emprise du Chaos. De nombreux technoprêtres ont perdu la vie en tentant de repousser l'anticode perfide. Je ne risque pas d'oublier de sitôt la vue d'une mécadendrite devenue folle qui arrache la tête de son maître. Une fois les rituels terminés, les tourelles ont cessé de tirer, mais dès que nos soldats d'avant-garde se sont approchés des portes, les derniers vestiges de la corruption hérétique ayant survécu à la purge ont à nouveau animé leurs canons, terrassant par surprise de nombreuses âmes courageuses.
languages.original_text: A battle ensued between the cryptopurification viruses and the Chaos-stricken cogitators. Many Tech-Priests lost their lives in the fight against the devious scrap-code. It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.

traits.locale_text: Un combat a ensuite éclaté entre les virus de cryptopurification et les cogitateurs sous l'emprise du Chaos. De nombreux technoprêtres ont perdu la vie en tentant de repousser l'anticode perfide. Je ne risque pas d'oublier de sitôt la vue d'une mécadendrite devenue folle qui arrache la tête de son maître. Une fois les rituels terminés, les tourelles ont cessé de tirer, mais dès que nos soldats d'avant-garde se sont approchés des portes, les derniers vestiges de la corruption hérétique ayant survécu à la purge ont à nouveau animé leurs canons, terrassant par surprise de nombreuses âmes courageuses.

languages.text: 暗号浄化ウィルスと渾沌に冒された考算機との戦いが続いた。多くの技術司祭が狡猾な破壊コードとの戦いで命を落とした。狂暴化した機械触手が主人の首を引きちぎる光景が脳裏に焼き付いている。儀式が終わると、砲塔は砲撃を止めた。しかし、我々の前列がゲートに近づくや否や、粛清を生き延びた異端者たちが再び兵器を目覚めさせ、多くの勇敢な兵士の命を奪った。
languages.original_text: A battle ensued between the cryptopurification viruses and the Chaos-stricken cogitators. Many Tech-Priests lost their lives in the fight against the devious scrap-code. It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.

traits.locale_text: 暗号浄化ウィルスと渾沌に冒された考算機との戦いが続いた。多くの技術司祭が狡猾な破壊コードとの戦いで命を落とした。狂暴化した機械触手が主人の首を引きちぎる光景が脳裏に焼き付いている。儀式が終わると、砲塔は砲撃を止めた。しかし、我々の前列がゲートに近づくや否や、粛清を生き延びた異端者たちが再び兵器を目覚めさせ、多くの勇敢な兵士の命を奪った。

languages.text: Se produjo la batalla entre los virus de criptopurificación y los cogitadores afectados por el Caos. Muchos tecnosacerdotes dieron sus vidas en la batalla contra el código de chatarra. Sigo sin poder olvidar la visión de una mecadendrita descontrolada arrancando de cuajo la cabeza de su amo. Al terminar los rituales, las torretas dejaron de disparar. Sin embargo, cuando nuestra primera línea llegó a las puertas, los últimos restos de herejía que habían escapado a la purga despertaron las armas por última vez, cobrándose las vidas de muchos valientes.
languages.original_text: A battle ensued between the cryptopurification viruses and the Chaos-stricken cogitators. Many Tech-Priests lost their lives in the fight against the devious scrap-code. It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.

traits.locale_text: Se produjo la batalla entre los virus de criptopurificación y los cogitadores afectados por el Caos. Muchos tecnosacerdotes dieron sus vidas en la batalla contra el código de chatarra. Sigo sin poder olvidar la visión de una mecadendrita descontrolada arrancando de cuajo la cabeza de su amo. Al terminar los rituales, las torretas dejaron de disparar. Sin embargo, cuando nuestra primera línea llegó a las puertas, los últimos restos de herejía que habían escapado a la purga despertaron las armas por última vez, cobrándose las vidas de muchos valientes.

languages.text: Es begann eine Schlacht zwischen den Kryptosäuberungsviren und den Cogitatoren des Chaos. Viele Techpriester ließen im Kampf gegen dein heimtückischen Schadcode ihr Leben. Den Anblick, wie ein wildgewordener Mechadendrit seinem Meister den Kopf abreißt, vergisst man nicht so leicht. Nachdem die Rituale abgeschlossen waren, stellten die Geschütze ihr Feuer ein. Doch kaum näherten sich unsere vorderen Reihen den Toren, ließen die letzten Überreste der ketzerischen Seuche, die die Läuterung irgendwie überlebt hatten, ihre Wachen wieder aufwachen und nahmen vielen mutigen Seelen das Leben.
languages.original_text: A battle ensued between the cryptopurification viruses and the Chaos-stricken cogitators. Many Tech-Priests lost their lives in the fight against the devious scrap-code. It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.

traits.locale_text: Es begann eine Schlacht zwischen den Kryptosäuberungsviren und den Cogitatoren des Chaos. Viele Techpriester ließen im Kampf gegen dein heimtückischen Schadcode ihr Leben. languages.text: Kaos'un işgal ettiği kavramsayarlarla kriptoarındırma virüsleri arasında büyük bir savaş patlak verdi. Birçok Tekno Rahip, hain hurda koduna karşı savaşırken canından oldu. Zıvanadan çıkmış bir mekadentritin efendisinin kafasını koparışı, kolay unutulmuyor. Ayinler tamamlandıktan sonra taretlerin ateşi kesildi. Ancak ön saflarımız kapıya yaklaşır yaklaşmaz arınmadan kurtulmayı başaran kâfirce kodun kalıntıları, silahları yeniden aktifleştirip birçok yiğit savaşçının canını aldı.
languages.original_text: A battle ensued between the cryptopurification viruses and the Chaos-stricken cogitators. Many Tech-Priests lost their lives in the fight against the devious scrap-code. It's not easy to forget the sight of a rabid mechadendrite ripping its master's head off. Once the rituals were complete, the turrets ceased their fire. However, as soon as our front ranks approached the gates, the last remnants of the heretical taint that had somehow survived the purge awakened the weapons once more, claiming the lives of many brave souls.
